typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date,
		SourceSystemID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SouthridgeCustomers
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date,
		SourceSystemID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SouthridgeAddress
SouthridgeCustomers, SouthridgeAddress join(SouthridgeCustomers@CustomerID == SouthridgeAddress@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinCustomerAndAddress
JoinCustomerAndAddress select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SouthridgeCustomers@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CustomerStartDate = SouthridgeCustomers@CreatedDate,
		CustomerUpdatedDate = SouthridgeCustomers@UpdatedDate,
		SourceSystemID = SouthridgeCustomers@SourceSystemID,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		AddressUpdatedDate = SouthridgeAddress@UpdatedDate
	)) ~> ChangeColumnNames
ChangeColumnNames derive(ActiveFlag = true(),
		RecordEndDate = toString(null())) ~> CalculateDate
CalculateDate select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		RecordStartDate = CustomerStartDate,
		RecordEndDate,
		ActiveFlag
	)) ~> ReorderColumns
ReorderColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DimCustomers.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SouthridgeCustomersDW
